gt:
Hey there! üòÑ Let's dive into the sewing tasks that use the luxurious material, Silk. Here's a neat table with all the details:

| Sewing Task ID | Start Time          | End Time            | Working Group Name |
|----------------|---------------------|---------------------|--------------------|
| 11             | March 21, 2024      | April 14, 2024      | Premier Sewers     |
| 12             | March 27, 2024      | April 12, 2024      | Master Sewers      |
| 13             | March 27, 2024      | April 6, 2024       | Master Sewers      |
| 14             | March 18, 2024      | April 8, 2024       | Master Sewers      |

These tasks are handled by the talented Premier Sewers and Master Sewers groups. Happy sewing! üßµ‚ú®

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM materials WHERE name = 'Silk';
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID for the material with the name "Silk"

steps.sql: SELECT sewing_task_id FROM sewing_material_allocation WHERE warehouse_material_id IN (SELECT id FROM warehouse_material WHERE material_id = '5');
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing task IDs that use the material "Silk"

steps.sql: SELECT st.id, st.start_time, st.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN working_group wg ON st.working_group_id = wg.id WHERE st.id IN (11, 12, 13, 14);
steps.description: Retrieve the details of sewing tasks using the task IDs obtained in Step2
